【Now Sports】美國隊長佩利錫透露，將在車路士新帥杜曹麾下，轉型為「假9」輔助正箭頭攻堅。

車路士上輪英超對般尼，佩利錫（Christian Pulisic）後備入替，助攻給左閘馬高斯阿朗素窩利抽入，看來已經找回狀態。 「就是『偽前鋒』的角色，有點似輔鋒。」佩利錫曾在多蒙特與杜曹共事，雙方早有默契，「暫時看來效果不錯，球隊在新領隊麾下取得不錯的開局，大家在更衣室都感到興奮莫名。」 「平日操練，我們都有講有笑，隊友之間都掛著笑容踢波。」周四藍戰士將作客熱刺，美國隊長續說：「這時候面對他們正是時候，球隊已重拾信心，相信是乘勝追擊的時機。」 藍軍與熱刺同得33分，但比對方踢多1場。
曹轟上呀

唐氏群組

Thomas Tuchel has revealed the idea of playing Callum Hudson-Odoi as a wing-back first entered his head when he and his assistants were on the plane to London preparing to begin their Chelsea journey.

‘I didn’t know he hadn’t played wing-back before,’ said Tuchel.

‘Maybe it was a good thing I didn’t ask because maybe I would have doubted my decision!

‘We just had one training session before the Wolves game. We were flying in on the same day and wondering what structure to implement to give the team a good feeling, and to have a solid block defensively but also to attack freely.

‘To play with four you have to be very disciplined, and the automatisms between the line of four have to be very synchronised.

‘So we opted for a back five and we didn’t want to get too defensive. We thought about trying Reece and Callum on the right side in training. Callum fitted very good and we wanted to have at least four offensive guys on the pitch from the start.

‘We just let him drive and he did very good, showing all his qualities he has: the high speed, the quick recoveries, dribbles, good one-on-one,' the boss continued.

‘He took his chance. There was no need to change for the second game and he did another good match.

‘Maybe in some defensive duels in the air there is space to improve, but this is absolutely normal. I am very happy he was happy to be on the pitch. He has given his best and that’s what we have asked for.’

‘So we opted for a back five and we didn’t want to get too defensive. We thought about trying Reece and Callum on the right side in training. Callum fitted very good and we wanted to have at least four offensive guys on the pitch from the start.

‘We just let him drive and he did very good, showing all his qualities he has: the high speed, the quick recoveries, dribbles, good one-on-one,' the boss continued.

‘He took his chance. There was no need to change for the second game and he did another good match.

‘Maybe in some defensive duels in the air there is space to improve, but this is absolutely normal. I am very happy he was happy to be on the pitch. He has given his best and that’s what we have asked for.’

The boss was interviewed pitchside in north London ahead of his first derby game in charge of the Blues, and he was asked if James’s inclusion would mean a change in shape with Callum Hudson-Odoi moving further forward.

‘A little bit, a little bit,’ Tuchel responded.

‘This is what we have in the pocket, and this is what we can decide because we have a squad with many good players. They deserve to play.

‘I’m super happy with the result,’ said Tuchel. ‘It was a very good performance against a tough opponent.

‘It was our first away game and we did very well. We controlled the first half completely, we were able to play very high up the pitch in the Tottenham half and it was a good half. It wasn’t always easy to find our rhythm but I was really pleased with the guys.

‘The second half was more difficult and we lost more possession and some easy ball losses. Sometimes our passing was too long but when we could escape the pressure, we had big chances to score more goals but in the end it is a very good result for us.’
